page.title: 06FARM DOGS
page.content: My dad is a farmer. He has working dogs. They are sheep dogs, one is a "Beardie". All the farms in this area are sheep and hill cattle farms and all the farmers need dogs to help control their stock. The dogs are trained from they are pups. They live outdoors or in a shed all their working lives. They are not pets and they are not allowed inside the house. My dad controls the dogs with his voice. When he "gathers", he rounds up the sheep or cattle. The dogs control where the sheep move. The sheep are gathered for shearing, dipping, counting,and for market. One of our best dogs disappeared last autumn. My dad was very sad because he had lost a good worker.
